item.title: Paper Published
item.author: me@example.com (joy)
item.description: Paper Published A laundry list of papers, publications and articles posted elsewhere that I have participated and contributed. Subset-optimized BLS Multi-signature with Key Aggregation: https://eprint.iacr.org/2023/498.pdf zkLogin: Privacy-Preserving Blockchain Authentication with Existing Credentials https://arxiv.org/abs/2401.11735 Cryptography in Sui: https://mystenlabs.com/blog/cryptography-in-sui-agility Zero knowledge range proofs: https://mystenlabs.com/blog/zero-knowledge-range-proofs
